name: Devout Warpriest
text: As your mastery of divine magic increases, you learn to weave prayers that can bring divine objects into the world from the astral realms. Wall of shields forms a protective phalanx around you and your allies, its divine power stopping attackers in their tracks.

features.devoutAction(11thLevel): You gain a benefit associated with your domain
features.divineResurgence(11thLevel): You gain the divine resurgence power
features.level12DomainUtilityPower(12thLevel): You gain a utility power associated with your domain
